menuItem.description:
7up Lemon & Lime is a low calorie Lemon and Lime flavoured soft drink, available for delivery to homes, 
 offices and workplaces directly from our warehouse in South London. 
 Clear, bright and colourless liquid with a lively carbonation. Delicate, 
 enticing aroma of lemon and lime, fused and dusted with powdered sugar.
menuItem.name: 7up Lemon & Lime
